name: Lucy's Dreaming
description: Lucy's Dreaming is a third-person 3D platformer with stealth sections. You play as Lucy a small child that just lost her parents and is put in a new home. For reasons unknown all of Lucy's toys were taken away and spread throughout the mansion. Search, dream, and sneak to retrieve all of Lucy's toys with the help of her imaginary friend. However, be wary of the darkness as it comes alive with the imagination of a child.
